title: Visions of Vanaheim
description: Visions of Vanaheim by Svartesól discusses the Vanic side of the Northern Tradition – honoring a race of Gods connected with the fertility of the Earth, from life to death and back again.This book explores the history of the North and the differences between Aesir and Vanir; the Deities known or suspected to be Vanir and those related by marriage or adoption; rites, magic, and devotion in a Vanic practice, and thoughts on the Vanic way from those who live it.The Vanir have much to offer the 21st century, and by exploring the mysteries of the Vanir, we can find the sacred in our world.
author: Svartesól
